name: Music Jumper
description:
Jump from note to note in this music based platformer. Use your Space bar to Jump and use your down arrow  to initiate a swift dash downwards.

Note: The music may glitch out from time to time due to it being unable to load. Also, the quit game buttons do not work as this was developed with the game having its own window.


Patch Notes for update 1.1:

Game will get progressively harder the longer you survive
